kpi.name: M8001C426

kpi_info.title: Unavailability of dedicated preamble for handover purposes
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of events when a dedicated preamble could not be assigned (eNB -> UE) for handover purposes because of insufficient dedicated preamble resources in the cell. UPDATED: eNB-internal trigger

kpi.kpi_alias: Unavailability of dedicated preamble for handover purposes
